CustomObject.description:
Please use $ before the name of variables. Eg: For SiteVisit Templetes = $ProjectName, $Date, $Time, $DateTime, $LeadName, $LeadMobile, $LeadMobileAlt, $SalesRepName, $SalesRepContact, $AssistantContact.
For Booking Templetes = $RcptNo, $Amount, $Amount, $PaymentMilestone, $UnitNo, $Tower, $ProjectName, $CustomerName, $NewCustomerName
CustomObject.label: SMS Templete
